quote: The more you know, the more you know you don't know.
Life is a series of rooms and who we get stuck in those rooms with adds up to what our lives are.
I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
Get busy living, or get busy dying.
source: Morgan Freeman in <cite title='Shawshank Redemption'>Shawshank Redemption</cite>

quote: You Can't Always Get What You Want.
The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.
Heroes get remembered, but legends never die.
With great power comes great responsibility.
Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Be Kind; Everyone You Meet is Fighting a Hard Battle
Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
